Friends and Family group has launched the Haskell test-net. We will diligently test it and new operators join us in a few weeks. It means that decentralized #Cardano #mainnet and staking is literally behind the corner. You will be soon able to delegate real $ADA to pools.  https://t.co/L6iyu2AO0l
